mfa_sms_page.heading: Authenticate via SMS
mfa_sms_page.description: Add a phone number to receive codes by sms
mfa_sms_page.phone_input_error_invalid_region: Number not valid for this region
mfa_sms_page.phone_input_error_invalid_format: Enter only digits without spaces, excluding the leading 0

mfa_email_page.heading: Authenticate via Email
mfa_email_page.description: Add an email address to receive codes by email

secret_page.heading: Welcome to ${business_name}
secret_page.description: There's nothing to see here yet. But an awesome home page is coming soon.

sign_in_page.heading: Welcome back
sign_in_page.description: Enter your email and we'll send a sign in code.
sign_in_page.email_input_error_invitation_mismatch: The email must match the one your invitation was sent to
sign_in_page.email_input_error_no_account_found: No account found with this email
sign_in_page.auth_form_error_no_auth_methods_enabled: Sorry, we don't see a way to authenticate you at the moment.

sign_up_page.heading: Create an account
sign_up_page.description: It's great to have you here
sign_up_page.invitation_description: You have been invited to join ${business_name}. Please sign in or sign up to accept the invitation.
sign_up_page.email_input_error_invitation_mismatch: The email must match the one your invitation was sent to
sign_up_page.email_input_error_domain_invalid: We can't sign you up with this email domain. Try a different email.
sign_up_page.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to our policies
sign_up_page.disclaimer_clickwrap_error_required: You must read and accept the policies to continue
sign_up_page.disclaimer_dialog_description: To continue signing up, we need you to read and accept our policies
sign_up_page.auth_form_error_terms_not_accepted: You must read and accept the policies to continue
sign_up_page.auth_form_error_no_auth_methods_enabled: Sorry, we don't see a way to authenticate you at the moment.
sign_up_page.auth_form_error_org_not_accepting_regist: The specified organization is not accepting registrations

account_locked_page.heading: Account locked
account_locked_page.description: You've entered an incorrect code too many times and your account has been locked for ${lockout_duration_minutes} minutes

password_setup_page.heading: Password setup
password_setup_page.password_input_error_too_common: That password is quite common. Make it harder to guess.
password_setup_page.password_input_error_too_short: Passwords need to be at least 8 characters
password_setup_page.password_input_error_extra_space: A password can't start or end with a space

recovery_codes_page.heading: Almost there
recovery_codes_page.description: Copy these recovery codes and keep them somewhere safe. You’ll need them if you ever need to sign in without your device.
recovery_codes_page.recovery_codes_page_error_already_viewed: Looks like you've already viewed the recovery codes once, so we can't show them again. If you need help signing in, contact your account admin.

subscribe_form_widget.heading: Stay in the loop
subscribe_form_widget.description: Hear from us about product updates, news and events

password_verify_page.heading: Enter your password
password_verify_page.password_input_error_too_short: Passwords need to be at least 8 characters

sms_verify_code_page.heading: Verify phone number
sms_verify_code_page.description: Enter the code we just sent to ${phone_number}
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Your confirmation code has expired, please request a new one
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code: Please enter a valid confirmation code
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code_length: The confirmation code should be 6 digits
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_resend_requested_too_so: Cannot send another code just yet. Please try again later

recovery_code_verify_page.heading: Recovery code
recovery_code_verify_page.description: Enter one of the recovery codes you were provided during your initial sign up.
recovery_code_verify_page.recovery_code_input_error_unknown_error: There's a problem authenticating with that recovery code
recovery_code_verify_page.recovery_code_input_error_too_short: Enter a recovery code at least 9 characters long

verification_code_sms.description:
${generated_code} is your one-time code to sign in to ${business_name}

@${receiver_domain} #${generated_code}

choose_organization_page.heading: Where do you want to sign in?

request_access_page.heading: We’ll keep you updated and send an invitation when access is available
request_access_page.description: We'll keep you updated and let you know when your invitation is ready
request_access_page.success_heading: Thanks for requesting access. We’ve added you to our list and will send updates soon.
request_access_page.success_description: Thanks for requesting access to ${business_name}. We've added you to our subscribers list and will let you know as soon as an invite is available.

sign_in_confirm_code_page.description: Enter the code we just sent to ${email_address}

sign_in_confirm_code_page.warning_too_many_incorrect_attempts: Too many incorrect codes were entered, so we sent a fresh one to ${email_address}

sign_up_confirm_code_page.heading: Check your email
sign_up_confirm_code_page.description: Enter the code we just sent to ${email_address}
sign_up_confirm_code_page.finish_sign_up_code_description: To continue, enter the code we just sent to ${email_address}
sign_up_confirm_code_page.continue_sign_up_code_description: To continue, enter the code we just sent to ${email_address}
sign_up_confirm_code_page.resent_code: We just sent a new code to ${email_address}

sign_up_confirm_code_page.warning_too_many_incorrect_attempts: Too many incorrect codes were entered so we've just sent a fresh one to ${email_address}

authenticator_app_manual_page.heading: Authenticator app
authenticator_app_manual_page.description: Enter the following code in your preferred authenticator app. Then enter the one-time code you receive below.
authenticator_app_manual_page.code_input_error_required: Please enter a valid verification code
authenticator_app_manual_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Your confirmation code has expired, please request a new one
authenticator_app_manual_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code_length: A confirmation code must be 6 digits
authenticator_app_manual_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code: Please enter a valid confirmation code

authenticator_app_qr_code_page.heading: Authenticator app
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.description: Scan the QR code below using your preferred authenticator app. Enter the one-time code you receive below.
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.verified_authentication_app_description: Open your verified authentication app and enter the code below
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.code_input_error_required: Please enter a valid verification code
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Your confirmation code has expired, please request a new one
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code: Please enter a valid confirmation code
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code_length: A confirmation code must be 6 digits

email_address_verification_email.email_body: This code will expire in 2 hours. If you don't think you should be receiving this email, you can safely ignore it.
email_address_verification_email.email_preview: Please use the code below to confirm your email address and continue on ${business_name}
email_address_verification_email.email_disclaimer: You received this email because you requested a confirmation code from ${business_name}

general_errors.action_allowed_only_once: The requested action could only be executed once.
general_errors.no_organization_access: Sorry, you do not have access to this organization.
general_errors.operation_not_permitted: The requested action could not be completed.
general_errors.invitation_email_mismatch: That email address doesn’t seem quite right. You’ll need to sign in using the email address the invitation was sent to.
general_errors.email_domain_not_allowed: We can’t finish signing you up as the email domain we detected is not allowed. Try a different sign up method.
general_errors.invitation_expired: Looks like you waited a bit long to accept and your invitation expired. Ask your admin to invite you again.
general_errors.user_suspended: You cannot sign in at the moment
general_errors.unknown_error: Something went wrong when we tried to authenticate you, and we can’t offer a quick way out. Start a new session and try signing in again.

account_not_found_page.heading: We can’t find your account
account_not_found_page.description: We just need a few more details to finalize your account.
account_not_found_page.description_sign_ups_disabled: Try using a different account or sign-in option
account_not_found_page.description_social: Do you want to create a new one with your ${social_provider_name} account?
account_not_found_page.description_credential: Do you want to create a new account with ${credential} now?

phone_number_component.phone_input_error_sms_limit_reached: Can't send code. SMS message service not set up. Sign in using another method.
phone_number_component.phone_input_error_invalid_country_code: Invalid country code. Select from the country list.
phone_number_component.phone_input_error_required: Phone number can't be left blank
phone_number_component.phone_input_error_invalid_format: Enter a valid number without spaces or leading country code
phone_number_component.phone_input_error_no_account_found: No account found with this phone number

username_component.username_input_error_no_account_found: No account found with this username
username_component.username_input_error_invalid_format: Sorry. Usernames can only have letters, numbers, -dashes, or _underscores.
username_component.username_input_error_already_exists: That username is taken. Add a few characters or try something different.
username_component.username_input_error_invalid_length: Choose a unique username between 2 and 64 characters
username_component.email_or_username_error_required: Email or username must not be blank
username_component.email_or_username_input_error_invalid: Enter a valid email or username
